sentences.english: There are 4 carbons in the longest chain ( but ) with no carbon-carbon double bonds ( ane ).
sentences.chinese: 首先没有双键，是烷烃，所以结尾应是。

sentences.english: It is a saturated hydrocarbon belonging to the alkane homologous series.
sentences.chinese: 是饱和碳氢化合物，属于烷烃同系物。

sentences.english: The main way for the reductive dechlorination of chloralkane is the direct transfer of electron.
sentences.chinese: 电子直接转移是氯代烷烃还原脱氯的主要途径。

sentences.english: Alkylation of wheat straw alkaline lignin was conducted by reacting lignin with different alkyl halides .
sentences.chinese: 用不同的卤代烷烃与碱木质素进行烷基化反应。

sentences.english: Basically, low concentration of alkane background gas has no effect on the removal efficiency of malodorous gas. ?
sentences.chinese: 低浓度的烷烃背景气体对恶臭的脱除效率基本无影响。

sentences.english: The present researches and application of isomerization catalysts of light-hydrocarbon are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 对烷烃异构化催化剂的研究现状及应用进行了综述。

sentences.english: The effects become more striking with increasing the alkyl chain length of the alcohol molecules.
sentences.chinese: 随着醇分子的烷烃链增长，这种影响更为显著。

sentences.english: The straight-chain alkanes exacerbate the problem of engine "knock".
sentences.chinese: 直链烷烃使机器的“爆震”问题更加严重。

sentences.english: A hydrocarbon was known to be either an alkene or alkane.
sentences.chinese: 某碳氢化合物已知可能是烯烃或是烷烃。

sentences.english: An example of a normal paraffin is normal butane.
sentences.chinese: 正丁烷是正链烷烃的一个例子。

sentences.english: The structure matrix was applied to forecast chromatograph retention index of alkane.
sentences.chinese: 将结构矩阵应用于链烷烃色谱保留指数的预测。

sentences.english: From their findings they predicted that an alkane that was long enough would eventually cross over into hydrophilicity .
sentences.chinese: 由此，他们推测，足够常的烷烃最终会具有亲水性。

sentences.english: In addition, the higher content of n-paraffin in diesel made the sensitivity of cold flow improver worse.
sentences.chinese: 柴油中正构烷烃含量高使低温流动改进剂感受性变差。

sentences.english: The fewer average carbon number of n paraffin in diesel is, the lower cold filter plugging point is.
sentences.chinese: 柴油中正构烷烃的平均碳数越少，冷滤点越低。

sentences.english: The effective length of carbon chain of alkanes was built up by using the polarizability effective index.
sentences.chinese: 利用极化效应指数，构造了链烷烃的有效碳链长度。

sentences.english: In the roots, there were carboxylic acid ester and alkane.
sentences.chinese: 而茅莓根的主要化学成分是有机酸酯和烷烃。

definition: haloalkane (obtained from hydrocarbon by substituting halogen for hydrogen, e.g. chlorobenzene or the CFCs)
